channel.title: PvP help?!?
channel.description:
Mkay so heres my stats/gear
[IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/stats.jpg[/img]
Jst wanted advice on what stats / gear i shld get to become a good pker?

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:21, topic:404200”]Here’s how I see it:

High str is good against high att/low def
High def is good against high str/low att
High att is good against high def/low str

It’s like a combat triangle within the combat triangle :O[/quote]
The matrix is unfolding! Everyone run!

Read full topic

item.description:

Here’s how I see it:

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:19, topic:404200”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=501260.msg3669077#msg3669077 date=1310787029]
Just do what I do, 40 attack, 99 str 1 defence and what ever hp that gets you, I have like 10 pking accounts botting like that. 3 already had 99 str
[/quote]
Wanna hook me up with one of those :D[/quote]
Hook me up with a 20 oz bottle of grey goose and we got a deal.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Davidi2:

99 def, str pures fail at life

99 def sucks with like 80 strength, trust me my friends account had 99 def 80 str 80 attk and i TRYED to pked on his account and didn’t own 1 person because i couldn’t combo for shit

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

TBH I know it doesn’t work for you now, but you should box with an account that has just 90+ str and 90+ defence.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

In case you didn’t know, you can still get 99 strength and be well balanced. You’ll just be hitting the high hits more often What’s so bad about that?

Read full topic

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

Yes^^^ I’d rather be excited to try and hit 50’s with aha instead of continuous 30"s with whip as a Def nerd

Read full topic

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:404200”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=501260.msg3668699#msg3668699 date=1310767222]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=501260.msg3667856#msg3667856 date=1310717531]

99 def, str pures fail at life

You jealous of str pures?
[/quote]If I wanted to have one I would, they just fail in general. One of my friends thinks he’s a pro pker, has 90+ att/str, 40 def, etc, I still kick his ass with my account with melle that doesn’t have any 90+ melle stats.

str pures are more lethal whereas def nerds are more conservative in a sense, so you can’t really say str pures fail. one good special attack from a str pure could essentially clean your bank, whereas more balanced accounts are better at dm’s etc
[/quote]But if the str pure can’t hit anyway… I’m not saying that a pure defense would be better, but if you balance it out you do have a better chance to win.[/quote]
i’d still go with str pures because although they rarely hit on high defense, they are powerful when they do. well, just my opinion… i think that balanced is boring because you can’t really hit anything out of the ordinary.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP help?!?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:11, topic:404200”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=501260.msg3667856#msg3667856 date=1310717531]

You jealous of str pures?
[/quote]If I wanted to have one I would, they just fail in general. One of my friends thinks he’s a pro pker, has 90+ att/str, 40 def, etc, I still kick his ass with my account with melle that doesn’t have any 90+ melle stats.

str pures are more lethal whereas def nerds are more conservative in a sense, so you can’t really say str pures fail. one good special attack from a str pure could essentially clean your bank, whereas more balanced accounts are better at dm’s etc[/quote]But if the str pure can’t hit anyway… I’m not saying that a pure defense would be better, but if you balance it out you do have a better chance to win.

Read full topic
